title: US gov shutdown enters 3rd week with ETF ‘floodgates’ ready to burst
contentSnippet: The crypto industry is awaiting a final decision on 16 crypto exchange-traded funds this month, including funds tracking Solana, XRP, Litecoin and Dogecoin.

title: Trader who made $192M shorting the crypto crash is doing it again
contentSnippet: The Hyperliquid trader made millions from short positions placed just minutes before Trump’s tariff announcement, sparking wild theories.

title: MARA Holdings Buys $46 Million in Bitcoin Post-Crypto Market Tumble
contentSnippet: MARA has bought $46 million BTC after Friday's event, with one analyst saying the firm is "taking a call" that Bitcoin has more room to run.

title: Steak ‘n Shake quickly U-turns as Ether poll angers Bitcoiners
contentSnippet: Steak ‘n Shake quickly retracted the idea of accepting Ether as a payment after Bitcoiners slammed its poll asking the community if it should.

title: Bitcoin May Tank to $100K as Friday’s BTC Crash Reinforced 2017–21 Trendline Resistance
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's recent crash marks the third failure to maintain gains above a critical trendline from 2017 and 2021 highs.

title: How Crypto Traders Are Positioning Following 'Black-Friday's' Crash
contentSnippet: Experts are downplaying the weekend rebound, citing structural risks as traders resort to put-buying for downside protection.

title: Crypto derivatives funding rates drop to 3-year lows: A bullish sign?
contentSnippet: Crypto derivatives funding rates have fallen to levels last seen in the 2022 bear market, as billions in leveraged positions were liquidated.

title: 430億円規模に、バイナンスが「異例の補償」実施　トランプ・ショックに関する価格異変で
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所バイナンスがトランプ関税による市場下落時の不具合で損失補償を発表した。USDe、BNSOLなどのディペッグで強制清算が発生した背景がある。

title: Bitcoin Core v30 goes live with controversial OP_RETURN change
contentSnippet: Bitcoin Core launched its major v30 update on Saturday, with the community split over its drastic increase to the OP_RETURN data limit.

title: White House reportedly mulling pardon for Binance founder CZ
contentSnippet: Binance co-founder Changpeng Zhao said that being considered for a presidential pardon from Trump would be “great news if true.”

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Ethereum Leads Recovery After $20B Liquidation Shock
contentSnippet: ETH’s rebound is outpacing BTC's as markets stabilize, with high-beta plays like Solana and Bittensor joining the bounce. One working theory suggests Friday’s meltdown wasn’t about stablecoin fragilit

title: Crypto Community Mourns Passing of RTFKT Co-Founder Benoit Pagotto
contentSnippet: The 41-year-old behind Nike’s digital fashion arm has died, colleagues confirmed Sunday, with tributes coming from the crypto industry.

title: トム・リー氏「イーサリアム下落は一時的」、相場を支える3要因とは
contentSnippet: ビットマインが市場下落時に730億円相当のイーサリアムを買い増したとみられる。トム・リー会長は3つの構造的要因が変化しない限り市場の追い風になると強気の見解を示している。

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Rebound Following 'Largest Single-Day Wipeout in Crypto History'
contentSnippet: Crypto prices are rebounding after a tariff-shock selloff that triggered one of the market’s largest single-day liquidation waves.

title: ETH, BNB, DOGE lead as crypto market cap rebounds to $4T
contentSnippet: Ether, BNB and Solana led as the crypto market powered back up after Friday’s flash crash, with crypto treasury firm BitMine capitalizing on the dip.

title: ETH readies to reclaim $4.5K as futures markets stabilize from crypto flash crash
contentSnippet: ETH price sharply recovered as market fears eased and derivatives stabilized, suggesting that a return to $4,500 could be Ether’s next stop.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Binance says tokens did not crash to $0, claims 'display' issue responsible
contentSnippet: The tokens did not actually crash to $0; users saw tokens plummet so dramatically due to a "display" issue, the Binance exchange said.

title: Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino: ‘Bitcoin and Gold Will Outlast Any Other Currency’
contentSnippet: Paolo Ardoino’s latest comment about bitcoin and gold echoes Tether’s policy of buying BTC with profits and building up gold exposure.

title: When Robots Look Human, People Feel Safer—Until They Don't
contentSnippet: Researchers found that the closer robots get to looking human, the less people want them to.

title: 'Eve Frontier' Jumps Ship from Ethereum to Sui—Here’s Why
contentSnippet: The Eve Online spinoff is moving to Sui due to a “deep philosophical” alignment on the future of the game.

title: Altcoins Cratered in Oct. 10 Crypto Flash Crash as Bitcoin Held Up, Wiston Capital Says
contentSnippet: Wiston Capital's Charlie Erith says a leverage cascade drove the Oct. 10 break, with altcoins hit hardest, and lays out the signals he will track before adding risk.

title: Binance to Compensate Users Affected by Crash in wBETH, BNSOL, and Ethena’s USDe
contentSnippet: Wrapped tokens crashed as Binance's infrastructure buckled, making it harder for market makers to stabilize prices.

title: Green Shoots on China Lifts Crypto in Sunday Action
contentSnippet: Both Beijing and Washington moved to calm trade tensions over the weekend.

title: AI Models Might Be Able to Predict What You'll Buy Better Than You Can
contentSnippet: A new study shows large language models can mirror human purchase intent with near-survey accuracy—hinting at a future where synthetic shoppers replace real ones in market research.

title: European Banking Authority Warns of Risks During Transitional Period
contentSnippet: The regulator claims crypto firms approved before MiCA pose a risk while operating until the end of the transitional period in 2026.

title: Q4 Crypto Surge? Historical Trends, Fed Shift and ETF Demand Align
contentSnippet: With interest rates at a 3-year low and $18 billion in ETF inflows, CoinDesk Indices sees a strong setup for continued gains in BTC and altcoins.

title: There Is Too Much Friction in Web3 For Newcomers. Here’s How We Fix it.
contentSnippet: The promise of a seamless digital economy is being sabotaged by a simple, recurring nightmare: network switching, says ZetaChain core contributor Jonathan Covey.

title: China’s Commerce Ministry to Trump: Rare-Earth Export Curbs Are Not Bans
contentSnippet: China’s commerce ministry says its Oct. 9 rare-earth export controls are lawful security steps, not bans, and that eligible civilian exports will be licensed.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ETH1万ドル到達の可能性やBNBの過去最高値更新など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、BNB、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: IG証券のビットコインETF「IBIT」CFD取引の始め方｜税制・手数料・リスクを徹底解説
contentSnippet: IG証券のビットコインETF「IBIT」CFD取引を徹底解説。申告分離課税適用で税率20.315%の可能性、24時間365日取引、レバレッジ5倍など特徴を詳しく紹介。口座開設から注文方法、手数料、ファンディングコスト、リスク管理まで初心者にもわかりやすく説明します。

title: 高値圏での日柄調整が続く可能性、半減期サイクルの節目に警戒感｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: BTC円は1900万円トライに失敗し1860万円台で推移。米政府閉鎖による指標発表延期で方向感欠く展開が続く中、10月18日に半減期サイクルの重要な節目を迎える。過去のサイクルを意識した売り圧力とETF資金流入の綱引きに注目。

title: 週刊ニュース｜トランプ関税によるBTC暴落やBinance JapanとPayPayの提携に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週はメタプラネットの仮想通貨ビットコインの含み益、休眠クジラの6000億円BTC移動やトランプ関税などによるビットコイン急落、Binance JapanとPayPayの提携に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: Friday’s $20B Crypto Market Meltdown: A Bitwise Portfolio Manager’s Postmortem Analysis
contentSnippet: Jonathan Man outlines a $20 billion liquidation day, long-tail air pockets and a positioning reset that left markets on different footing by Saturday.

title: The Latest Nobel Peace Prize Winner Is a Bitcoin Supporter
contentSnippet: This year's Nobel Peace Prize winner, Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, previously spoke about Bitcoin as resistance money.

title: When You Tell AI Models to Act Like Women, Most Become More Risk-Averse: Study
contentSnippet: New research shows language models mirror human gender patterns in decision-making, with some AIs dramatically changing their risk tolerance based on whether they're prompted to think as male or femal

title: ビットコインの年間の実現純利益が継続的上昇、今後の動向は＝CryptoQuant

title: ケニア最大級のスラム街でビットコインが広がる理由｜Afribit創業者インタビュー
contentSnippet: ケニアの貧困地域で広がるビットコイン活用。なぜ使われ、どんな課題があるのか。現地取材による5つの質問と回答で、仮想通貨の実態をわかりやすく紹介。

title: 「トランプ・ショック」でアルト市場に異常値　ATOMが一時0.001ドルまで暴落
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領の対中関税警告で一部アルトコインがバイナンスなどで異常急落。ATOMは0.001ドルまで暴落しSUIは85%下落。過去24時間の清算総額は約3兆円に達した。
